2. New diagnostic WHILE testing devices:

   • Then submit diagnostic

⚡ QUICK FIX (Try first):

1. Restart Homey (Settings → System → Reboot)
2. Wait 2 minutes
3. Remove & re-pair both devices within 2m of Homey
4. For motion sensor: Wait 60s during pairing (IAS Zone enrollment)
